resource.manifest:
apiVersion: networking.istio.io/v1alpha3
kind: VirtualService
metadata:
  name: {{inputs.parameters.app-name}}-vs
  labels:
    app: {{inputs.parameters.app-name}}
    WBS: E.RDI.10460
spec:
  gateways:
    - istio-system/istio-gateway
  hosts:
    - "*"
  http:
  - match:
    - port: 443
      uri:
        prefix: /{{inputs.parameters.app-name}}/
    name: webviz-route
    # rewrite:
    #   uri: /
    route:
    - destination:
        host: {{inputs.parameters.app-name}}-svc.ddpd.svc.cluster.local
        port:
          number: 5000
    timeout: 3m

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: {{inputs.parameters.app-name}}-svc
  labels:
    app: {{inputs.parameters.app-name}}
spec:
  ports:
    - port: 5000
  selector:
    app: {{inputs.parameters.app-name}}

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: {{inputs.parameters.app-name}}
  namespace: ddpd
  labels:
    app: {{inputs.parameters.app-name}}
    WBS: E.RDI.10460
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: {{inputs.parameters.app-name}}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: {{inputs.parameters.app-name}}
        WBS: E.RDI.10460
    spec:
      securityContext:
        runAsUser: 1000
      containers:
        - name: webviz
          image: "auroradevacr.azurecr.io/flowify/flownet-webviz:v1"
          command: [gunicorn]
          args:
            - --access-logfile="-"
            - --bind=0.0.0.0:5000
            - --keep-alive=120
            - --max-requests=40
            - --preload
            - --workers=2
            - --worker-class=gthread
            - --worker-tmp-dir=/dev/shm
            - --threads=2
            - --timeout=100000
            - --chdir=/mnt/data/{{inputs.parameters.src-path}}
            - "generated_app.webviz_app_fixed:server"
          env:
            - name: MPLCONFIGDIR
              value: /tmp
          imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
          ports:
            - name: http
              containerPort: 5000
              protocol: TCP
          resources:
            limits:
              cpu: 500m
              memory: 4Gi
            requests:
              cpu: 200m
              memory: 2Gi
          # readinessProbe:
          #   tcpSocket:
          #     port: 5000
          #   initialDelaySeconds: 5
          #   periodSeconds: 10
          # livenessProbe:
          #   tcpSocket:
          #     port: 5000
          #   initialDelaySeconds: 15
          #   periodSeconds: 20
          volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /tmp
              name: temp-files
            - name: flownet-fileshare
              mountPath: /mnt/data
      volumes:
        - emptyDir: {}
          name: temp-files
        - name: flownet-fileshare
          azureFile:
            readOnly: false
            secretName: flowify-fileshare-secret
            shareName: flownet
